David Letterman fielded a Aaron Rodgers spiral after the Super Bowl MVP was interviewed during a taping of`` The Late Show with David Letterman .'' After earning wild applause for his observation there must be a lot of Wisconsin people in David Letterman 's audience, Aaron Rodgers talked about his past as a lightly-recruited high school and junior college player, the realities of following Brett Favre as the Packers quarterback, and a conversation he had with cornerback Charles Woodson during the

Groups and singers as young as 12 years can audition for the series, which will premiere in the fall. Unlike`` American Idol,''`` The X Factor'' does not have an upper age limit. I like the idea that a 12-year-old on this show can compete with an older singer and a singing group, said Simon Cowell , the former`` American Idol'' who will be a judge and an executive producer on`` The X Factor.''`` I've never believed there should be a cut-off age for talent.''

Michael Vick is good people. He paid his dues. Barack Obama reached out to him. He deserves an opportunity. This is what makes America so great. He's moved forward. He's a whole other person. Before his 2007 arrest on dogfighting charges, Michael Vick was the NFL's highest paid player and had numerous endorsements. Vito said Michael Vick is the company's first corporate spokesman. Terms of his deal weren't disclosed

Tight end Brent Celek agreed, when he spoke via phone yesterday with a group of reporters from his minivacation getaway in Michigan: Sometimes he's taking some big-time hits, where maybe other guys would get flagged and he's not. Hopefully, they change it. He's a quarterback, too. He's the same as everybody else. Just because he's maybe a little bit more athletic and faster and can run, he shouldn't be penalized.
